results.title: Effect of preoperative administration of atenolol to dogs with pulmonic stenosis undergoing interventional procedures
results.text_hl: Effect of preoperative administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ to @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011666 @@@pulmonic stenosis@@@ undergoing interventional procedures

citations.NLM: Gomart S, MacFarlane P, Payne JR, Hezzell MJ, Borgeat K. Effect of preoperative administration of atenolol to dogs with pulmonic stenosis undergoing interventional procedures J Vet Intern Med. 2022 May;36(3):877-885. PMID: 35302255

results.title: Outcomes after combined percutaneous balloon valvuloplasty and external beam radiation therapy for the treatment of congenital pulmonic stenosis in four dogs.
results.text_hl: The present report details the clinical courses of four @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with congenital @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011666 @@@PS@@@, previously treated with conventional BPV and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (n = 4) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ alone (n = 1), two with anomalous, circumpulmonary coronary artery anatomy, which underwent BPV followed immediately by external beam radiation therapy (BPV + EBRT) to prevent valve @DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Nagata K, Coleman AE. Outcomes after combined percutaneous balloon valvuloplasty and external beam radiation therapy for the treatment of congenital pulmonic stenosis in four dogs. J Vet Cardiol. 2020 Apr;28():1-10. PMID: 32086158
citations.BibTeX: @article{32086158, title={Outcomes after combined percutaneous balloon valvuloplasty and external beam radiation therapy for the treatment of congenital pulmonic stenosis in four dogs.}, author={Nagata K and Coleman AE}, journal={J Vet Cardiol}, volume={28}, pages={1-10}}

results.title: Echocardiographic evaluation of velocity ratio, velocity time integral ratio, and pulmonary valve area in dogs with pulmonary valve stenosis
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ might reduce mean and max PG but does not alter less flow-dependent methods of assessment of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011666 @@@PS@@@ severity (velocity ratio, VTI ratio, and iPVA) in @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011666 @@@PS@@@.

citations.NLM: Nishimura S, Visser LC, Bélanger C, Oldach MS, Gunther-Harrington CT, Stern JA. Echocardiographic evaluation of velocity ratio, velocity time integral ratio, and pulmonary valve area in dogs with pulmonary valve stenosis J Vet Intern Med. 2018 Sep;32(5):1570-1578. PMID: 30079482
citations.BibTeX: @article{30079482, title={Echocardiographic evaluation of velocity ratio, velocity time integral ratio, and pulmonary valve area in dogs with pulmonary valve stenosis}, author={Nishimura S and Visser LC and Bélanger C and Oldach MS and Gunther-Harrington CT and Stern JA}, journal={J Vet Intern Med}, volume={32}, number={5}, pages={1570-1578}}

results.title: Keratoconjunctivitis sicca exacerbation in a dog treated with systemic atenolol.
results.text_hl: After 2 months, @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011666 @@@pulmonic stenosis@@@ was diagnosed, and the @SPECIES_9615 @@@dog@@@ commenced treatment with oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@; the @DISEASE_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@ophthalmological disease@@@ worsened dramatically within a few days.

citations.NLM: Barsotti G, Vezzosi T. Keratoconjunctivitis sicca exacerbation in a dog treated with systemic atenolol. J Small Anim Pract. 2016 Jul;57(7):379-81. PMID: 27071733
citations.BibTeX: @article{27071733, title={Keratoconjunctivitis sicca exacerbation in a dog treated with systemic atenolol.}, author={Barsotti G and Vezzosi T}, journal={J Small Anim Pract}, volume={57}, number={7}, pages={379-81}}
